mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ticket_tb WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY reserved_date DESC

select.if: SELECT t.*, departure_date, arrival_date, reserved_date, departure, destination, flight_time, a.name AS airplane_name, tid, amount1 AS amount, status1 AS status, r.type AS schedule_type FROM ticket_tb AS t JOIN schedule_tb AS s ON t.schedule_id = s.id JOIN route_tb AS r ON r.id = s.route_id JOIN airplane_tb AS a ON s.airplane_id = a.id LEFT JOIN ticket_payment_tb AS tp ON t.id = tp.ticket_id1 WHERE t.id = #{id};

SELECT t.*, departure_date, arrival_date, reserved_date, departure, destination, flight_time, a.name AS airplane_name, tid, amount2 AS amount, status2 AS status, r.type AS schedule_type FROM ticket_tb AS t JOIN schedule_tb AS s ON t.schedule_id = s.id JOIN route_tb AS r ON r.id = s.route_id JOIN airplane_tb AS a ON s.airplane_id = a.id LEFT JOIN ticket_payment_tb AS tp ON t.id = tp.ticket_id2 WHERE t.id = #{id};

mapper.update: UPDATE ticket_tb SET reserved_date = now() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.*, departure_date, arrival_date, departure, destination, flight_time, a.name AS airplane_name, tid, r.type AS schedule_type, CASE WHEN t.id = tp.ticket_id1 THEN amount1 WHEN t.id = tp.ticket_id2 THEN amount2 END AS amount, CASE WHEN t.id = tp.ticket_id1 THEN status1 WHEN t.id = tp.ticket_id2 THEN status2 END AS status FROM ticket_tb AS t JOIN schedule_tb AS s ON t.schedule_id = s.id JOIN route_tb AS r ON r.id = s.route_id JOIN airplane_tb AS a ON s.airplane_id = a.id JOIN ticket_payment_tb AS tp ON t.id IN (tp.ticket_id1, tp.ticket_id2) WHERE t.member_id = #{memberId} AND (status1 != 0 OR status2 != 0) ORDER BY reserved_date DESC;
